name: Artemis and the Sun
description:
You are the Moon spirit Artemis.

Gather the moon pieces.

Don't wake the sun.

WASD to move. Space to Jump.

E to shoot a beam and put out other lights.

Run over stars to collect them. Run over moons to collect them.

Find 3 Moons!

Trailer:

https://youtu.be/2erRD6j7Zr8
